attributes.action: Stop the tradional Herbal Medicinal Products Directive. and Safety for schools.
attributes.additional_details: because for the tradional herval products directive we will have peace. and for every child in every school not to feel scared.
attributes.background: To stop tradional herbal medicinal products directive, and for every school and every child to have safety for them

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
